sourceMeaningMnemonic: You put your <radical>fingers</radical> in the <radical>coffin</radical> to tickle the <radical>beggar</radical> inside. What you're doing is a new form of <kanji>torture</kanji>.
meaningInfo: First, you put them in a coffin to make them think they're going to die. Then you tickle them with your fingers. There is no greater psychological + physical torture than this.
readingMnemonic: The beggar you will coffin tickle <kanji>torture</kanji> is none other than old Grandpa <ja><reading>ごう</reading>いち</ja>. He is a frail old man, and doesn't like to be tickled.
readingInfo: He keeps screaming: "STOP THIS TICKLE TORTURE. I CAN'T TAKE IT, JUST BURY ME."
